# DO NOT EDIT, GENERATED BY /Users/Olivier/Dev/shared/scripts/py/create_cmake.py

cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 3.5 )

set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "Debug;Release;")
if (NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
    message("Defaulting to release build.")
    set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Release)
endif()

project( tp_muparser )

set( CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin )
set( CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib )
set( CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib )
foreach( OUTPUTCONFIG ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES} )
    string( TOLOWER ${OUTPUTCONFIG} OUTPUTCONFIG )
    set( CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_${OUTPUTCONFIG} ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${OUTPUTCONFIG} )
    set( CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_${OUTPUTCONFIG} ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${OUTPUTCONFIG} )
    set( CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_${OUTPUTCONFIG} ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${OUTPUTCONFIG} )
endforeach( OUTPUTCONFIG CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES )

include_directories( /Users/Olivier/Dev/cg.math/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/gl.model/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/gl.platform/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/gl.program/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/gl.text/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/gl.view/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/glsl.composer/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/llv/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/managers/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/model/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/os.audio/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/os.leap/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/os.log/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/os.storage/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/os.video/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/scene/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/sim.grid/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.generic_simd/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.glfw/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.glm
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.leap/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.libpngpp
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.muparser/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.pa.ios/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.python.27/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.qu.googletest/googletest/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.vc/include
                     /Users/Olivier/Dev/wiremodeler/include )

set( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -fpermissive" )

# Static library 'tp_muparser'

add_library( tp_muparser
                         /Users/Olivier/Dev/tp.muparser/src/unity.build.cpp )

set( BUILD_SHARED_LIBS = OFF )

# Common properties

set_property( TARGET
                     tp_muparser
            PROPERTY
                     CXX_STANDARD 14 )
